solution_line_template: He presses {weight_per_rep} pounds x {reps_per_set} reps = <<{weight_per_rep}*{reps_per_set}={weight_per_set}>>{weight_per_set} pounds.
He moves {num_sets} sets x {weight_per_set} pounds = <<{num_sets}*{weight_per_set}={total_weight_moved}>>{total_weight_moved} pounds in total.
